api_list.name: Convert USD to Ethereum
api_list.description: The value is calculated based on the  Ethereum price from https://etherscan.io/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-service.p.rapidapi.com/price/convert-currency-to-eth"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-service.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert Ethereum to USD
api_list.description: The value is calculated based on the  Ethereum price from https://etherscan.io/

url = "https://ethereum-service.p.rapidapi.com/price/convert-eth-to-currency"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-service.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

api_list.name: Get Ethereum price
api_list.description: Get current Ethereum price from https://etherscan.io/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-service.p.rapidapi.com/price/get-eth-price"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-service.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Block by Qr Code
api_list.description: Retrieve block information by providing a Qr Code of block number or block hash

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: An image that contains the qr code of transaction hash

api_list.name: Get Blocks by a block hashses or block numbers
api_list.description: Get Block by providing an array of block hashes or block numbers

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-service.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
